alert.note: Alert for Eastern Norton Sound and Nulato Hills (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Surf Advisory issued July 24 at 1:38PM AKDT until July 27 at 12:00PM AKDT by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...HIGH SURF ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 10 PM MONDAY TO NOON AKDT WEDNESDAY... The National Weather Service in Fairbanks has issued a High Surf Advisory, which is in effect from 10 PM Monday to noon AKDT Wednesday. * LOCATION...Pt Romanof to Koyuk. * TIMING...Late Monday evening through Noon Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Objects left on the beach could be washed away. Minor beach erosion will occur. * WAVE AND SURF...Sea levels will rise 4 to 6 feet above the normal high tides. Waves will wash up to the top of the beach.
info.instruction: A High Surf Advisory means that localized beach erosion is expected. Precautions should be taken to protect property.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Norton Sound and Nulato Hills
